questions.text: Which of the following best describes Data Science?

options.text: The study of database management systems.
An interdisciplinary field to extract knowledge from data.
The art of creating data visualizations.

questions.explanation: Data Science uses scientific methods, processes, algorithms, and systems to extract knowledge and insights from structured and unstructured data.

questions.text: Data Wrangling is NOT considered a key component of Data Science.
questions.explanation: Data Wrangling (or Data Munging/Preparation) is a crucial component of Data Science, often taking a significant amount of time.

questions.text: Which of these are common applications of Data Science? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: E-commerce, healthcare, and finance are all major application areas for Data Science. Writing operating systems is primarily software engineering.
